calculations.name: Collateral Term Bucket
calculations.tableau_expression:
Case DATEPART('weekday',[title date])

WHEN 6 then

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

Else 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

END

ELSE 

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

ELSE

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END



END

END

calculation_context.Expression:
Case DATEPART('weekday',[title date])

WHEN 6 then

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

Else 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

END

ELSE 

if DATEADD('weekday',3,[title date]) =[Parameters].[Holidays] THEN 

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END

ELSE

if  [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',3,[title date]) then "0-3M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('month',6,[title date]) then "3M-6M"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',1,[title date]) then "6M -1Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',3,[title date]) then "1Y -3Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',5,[title date]) then "3Y -5Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',10,[title date]) then "5Y -10Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] <= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "10Y -30Y"
ELSEIF [Collateral Maturity] >= DATEADD('year',30,[title date]) then "> 30 Year"
END



END

END

calculated_fields.title date: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END
calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
